**Frequently asked questions:**  
  
**Q: What Operating Systems are available?**  
We offer a wide range of Operating Systems. We have a knowledgebase article that lists all available Operating Systems:  
https://clients.liteserver.nl/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/1/Available-Operating-Systems-ISO-or-Templates-for-KVM-and-OpenVZ-VPSes.html  
  
**Q: Where can I found your AUP (Acceptable Usage Policy) and TOS (Terms of Service)?**  
**AUP:** https://liteserver.nl/acceptable-usage-policy/  
**TOS:** https://liteserver.nl/general-terms-and-conditions-of-liteserver-b-v/  
**Privacy Policy:** https://liteserver.nl/privacy-policy/
  
**Q: What payment options are available?**  
You can pay with PayPal, iDeal, Bank Transfer, Credit Card or Bitcoin/Altcoin.  
  
**Q: What are the hardware specs of the VPS nodes LiteServer is using?**  
We have a knowledgebase article covering this question:
https://clients.liteserver.nl/index.php?rp=/knowledgebase/44/What-hardware-specs-does-the-LiteServer-VPS-platform-have.html   
  
**Q: Are your prices including VAT?**  
All our prices are excluding VAT. If you live in Europe your local VAT tax rate will apply. Companies within the EU that can provide a valid VAT number will get a 0% VAT invoice after approval. Customers outside the EU don't have to pay any VAT.  
  
**Q: Is the included bandwidth being reset each month?**  
Yes! The bandwidth counter for your VPS will be reset on the first day of each new calendar month
  
**Q: What happens when I reach my monthly VPS bandwidth?**  
We'll limit your network speed to 10Mbps for the rest of the month, unless you upgrade  
  
**Q: Where is my VPS hosted?**  
Your VPS will be hosted in the center of The Netherlands. More details regarding our location can be found on our website.  
  
**Q: Are your VPSes unmanaged our managed?**  
All our VPSes mentioned are unmanaged, which means you need to take care of the OS/software part. You may open a support ticket for technical questions.  
  
**Q: Do you have a looking glass and testfiles available?**  
**Looking Glass:** https://lg-dro.liteserver.nl  
**Test IPv4:** 185.31.172.235  
**Test IPv6:** 2a01:6340:1:20:3::10  
**Testfiles:** http://testfiles.mirror.liteserver.nl and/or http://testfiles.mirror.liteserver.nl/1GiB-1
  
**Q: Which network are you using?**  
We operate our own network AS60404.
